followRedirects.name: followRedirects
followRedirects.description: If you want to allow request redirects

headers.name: headers
headers.description: Http Request Headers as json. Eg: {'content-type' : 'application/json', 'accept' : 'application/json'}

queryParameters.name: queryParameters
queryParameters.description: Http Request Query Parameters as json

proxy.name: proxy
proxy.description: Proxy for the request as json. Eg : {'host' : '127.0.0.1', 'port' : '1234'}

cookies.name: cookies
cookies.description: Proxy for the request as json. Eg : [{'name' : 'value'}]

description: This Performance function is useful in doing Http Get Operation
